metadata.title: CVE-2018-12021 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Singularity 2.3.0 through 2.5.1 is affected by an incorrect access controlon systems supporting overlay file system. When using the overlay option, amalicious user may access sensitive information by exploiting a fewspecific Singularity features.

criterions.comment: singularity-container: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
